meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x metrics now with Micrometer.io
meta.summary: The new vertx-micrometer-metrics module provides support for collecting metrics with Micrometer.io and storing them in backends such as Graphite or InfluxDB.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x based Framework URL Shortener Backend
meta.summary: We combine Vert.x with the serverless framework to write a microservice that runs on AWS Lambda.

meta.title: TCP Client using Eclipse Vert.x, Kotlin and Gradle build
meta.summary: In this blog post, I demonstrate how to write a very simple TCP client that keeps a connection open to a custom-written server in cloud.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x meets GraphQL
meta.summary: In this blog post, we will look at an example application written in Vert.x that uses the new GraphQL API of Gentics Mesh.

meta.title: Introducing Vert.x MQTT client
meta.summary: In this article, we will see how to set up the new Vert.x MQTT client. An example project is available on GitHub.

meta.title: OpenAPI (fka Swagger) 3 support in Eclipse Vert.x now in test stage!
meta.summary: As GSoC 2017's student, I'm working on an embedded support to OpenAPI 3 standard inside Eclipse Vert.x framework. Now, after a lot of work, you can try it!
